channel.title: Shifting Player Rights (Quick Question) - 474/Luminosity Base
channel.description: Hey guys, quick question. I'm looking to shift all of the player rights up one. For example, Owner = 4, Moderator = 3, Another Rank = 2, Donator = 1, Regular = 0. However, I would like to shift the icons on the left of the player (crowns, etc.) along with the rights. I do not understand where these can be edited because I can not locate these anywhere client-sided. I don't even have the basic sprite files anywhere (.png or whatever) so that makes me even more clueless on where to edit this even though they [b]DO[/b] work in the game.

item.title: Shifting Player Rights (Quick Question) - 474/Luminosity Base
item.dc:creator: @Garbage_Breath Garbage Breath
item.description:
@Garbage_Breath wrote:

Hey guys, quick question. I’m looking to shift all of the player rights up one. For example, Owner = 4, Moderator = 3, Another Rank = 2, Donator = 1, Regular = 0. However, I would like to shift the icons on the left of the player (crowns, etc.) along with the rights. I do not understand where these can be edited because I can not locate these anywhere client-sided. I don’t even have the basic sprite files anywhere (.png or whatever) so that makes me even more clueless on where to edit this even though they DO work in the game.

Read full topic
